channel.title: Comments on: HowTo: Why and how you should use RSS (and what it is)

item.title: By: bluefacedpixie » Photos Per Day
item.dc:creator: bluefacedpixie » Photos Per Day
item.description: [...] I do think that the “batch upload” is sub-optimal – the three people who look at my website should be better served by occasional random pictures than a flood that they can’t keep track of – especially if they don’t do bloglines (how-to). [...]
item.content:encoded: […] I do think that the “batch upload” is sub-optimal – the three people who look at my website should be better served by occasional random pictures than a flood that they can’t keep track of – especially if they don’t do bloglines (how-to). […]

item.title: By: bluefacedpixie » Insane Runners
item.dc:creator: bluefacedpixie » Insane Runners
item.description: [...] While looking for trail runs this weekend I ran across A Slacker’s Running Blog – not. Nice picture, many miles, not quite our league. But the blog looks fun – I think I’ll add it to the bfp blogroll for a bit, and maybe even subscribe for a while. Posted by bfp in Blog This, Running | Time: 11:41 pm  [...]

item.description: Excellent - first RSS for Dummies that I've seen. Very useful!
